author: cryptoloops
title: Flooftopia: An Adorable CNFT Game!
description: 目前的NFT和NFT游戏专注于僵化的NFT结构，不能很好地满足广泛的人口统计学。

f6_assessments.q0:
我非常同意这个提案有效地解决了这个挑战。问题陈述针对的是一个具体的问题，即基于NFT的游戏主要针对的是游戏玩家，但一般来说，在我的经验中，我也看到小孩子在平板电脑/手机上玩游戏的人数大增。

当然，这些游戏要么是教育性的，要么是儿童专用的。因此，我认为在这个方向上有一个巨大的市场可以挖掘。

在Cardano上增加游戏的人口覆盖率将是非常好的。这个建议触及了基础，并提供了他们对这个问题的解决方案。
f6_assessments.q1:
团队的经验是公开的，对团队实现本提案目标的技术和业务能力有一个良好的第一印象。

我喜欢他们试图覆盖所有的层面，而不仅仅是一两个层面，例如编码、艺术、游戏设计、营销。因此，他们已经有了从各个方向覆盖这个提案的人，这是相当好的。

资金分配得到了很好的解释，每小时的分配也得到了解释。然而，我不确定为什么需要征收7%的税，如果能补充说明为什么需要征收这部分税就更好了。

此外，使用额外的催化剂资金部分提供了一个很好的细节，说明他们在即将到来的未来还想在哪里利用这些资金。总的来说，提案写得很好，因此，我完全同意所提出的经验和计划，这个提案很有可能成功实施。
f6_assessments.q2:
我非常同意，所提供的信息足以审计该提案的进展和成功。

商业模式--成功之路详细描述了团队迄今所做的工作，以及催化剂资金的作用。这让社区相信，他们并不完全依赖催化剂资金，而且非常有动力。

季度目标/里程碑介绍得很好，可以让社区对短期与长期的成功前景有一个认识。此外，还概述了风险，这使得社区在审核这项挑战的进展时能够牢记其中的风险。

总的来说，我不认为有任何问题可以用来追踪该提案的进展和成功。

f6_assessments.q0: 该游戏很好地满足了挑战的要求。这个想法是创造一个游戏，玩家可以通过许多细节来定制他们的角色，这将是一个NFT。我发现非常有趣的是，这个游戏也是针对儿童观众的，我不记得看到过其他迎合这部分人口的建议，而这部分人口与娱乐内容的创作有很大关系（我们知道他们可以有多大，例如，针对儿童的YouTube频道，这可以在游戏中重复）。如果该项目成功，它将是新用户进入Cardano生态系统的一个很好的通道，也许连玩游戏的孩子的父母都会有兴趣了解一下我们的区块链；它也肯定会增加游戏中被铸造的代币和ada交易的数量，所以我相信该项目会在不同方面有利于Cardano生态系统，与这个挑战完全一致。
f6_assessments.q1: 这个团队似乎很有能力，他们已经开发了整个视觉识别的概念，我们可以通过所附的网站了解，也可以通过提案中直接提供的人物形象了解。我认为它非常漂亮，对公众有吸引力，不仅仅是儿童。他们还提供了关于他们是谁的简短描述，包括他们的角色和一些过去的工作，所以他们可以向你保证他们的经验。而他们看起来确实相当有经验，例如，根据给出的描述，克里斯蒂安非常聪明，有超过十年的平面设计经验。关于这个团队与区块链的关系，从我读到的内容来看，康沃德将是与我们生态系统的技术联系最多的人，但我希望这个桥梁能被进一步探索。关于财务分割，他们精确地确定了总资金（相当高，但合理）的使用方式，这很好，但我认为每个部分可以更详细。有些部分很详细，如动画和编码工作，但另一方面，有些部分如营销和酷的部分却没有很好的解释。项目的这两部分占用了很高的资金份额，这使得我们有必要更好地了解正在发生的事情。在营销方面，能否解释一下传播活动将如何进行，通过哪些渠道进行，如何接触儿童？在他们解释项目发展的部分，他们在第一阶段提到将在社交网络上开展活动，这使我们推断部分营销活动将在那里进行。但重要的是，要了解这到底会如何产生。说到分阶段发展，我认为这部分项目是相当详细的，所以我们有一个相当准确的画面，知道什么会发生，什么时候发生，怎么发生，应该是这样的。所以我认为这里的这个话题非常好，我只是建议进一步深化所引用的某些部分的细节。
f6_assessments.q2: 优秀的可审计性，团队非常详细地定义了成功会是什么样子，所以我们有很多内容可以监测。除了专门为了解关键绩效指标而创建的主题外，我们还可以在监测方面更进一步，因为他们还详细说明了各阶段的情况，也就是说，我们知道将在什么时候发生什么，这样就有可能检查事情是否按承诺发生。需要做的是：1）团队准备一个结果总结，并向社区其他成员展示，我认为在这个项目的特定情况下，最合适的是参加一些市政厅，因为这是一个高度的项目。 视觉上，他们已经被证明在图形方面是很好的，如果我们有一个简短的视觉演示，说明结果是如何发展的，那就更好了。2）社区本身参与到游戏中，测试它，带来不断的反馈，一些成员可以被选中，包括那些有孩子的人可以做一些测试，看看孩子们对创造的宇宙和人物会有什么反应。也就是说，我相信这个项目的可审核性已经非常好了，只是需要社区来锻炼。

f6_assessments.q0:
Flooftopia aims to bring a brand new game on the Cardano blockchain, not only for PC but also on Android and IOS devices. 
Target users will include also children and women.
So the challenge is definitely addressed by this proposal
f6_assessments.q1:
The team has an extensive experience in the sector as some members worked for big gaming companies such as Ubisoft. The game structure is not based on pay to win, which potentially can bring more active users and encourage them to continuing the gaming experience.
A minus for not using the already existing CNFT.io webiste, because it would save some time and cost, but I guess using a dedicated NFT marketplace would help users avoiding switching pages and be lost buying wrong NFTs that would not work in the game. 
The risk analysis outlines potential delays that would be avoided by shifting temporarily some resources to overcome them. Moreover the team is well aware of the extra budget that might be required on top of the funding. The LOOP staking pool is also related to this project.
f6_assessments.q2: Key metrics, budget breakdown and timeline are clear and well summarized. The website structure is already in place, which leads to think the team is already fully operational.

f6_assessments.q0:
The idea of customizable NFT is awesome that I have never seen before, moreover, this idea can attract kids and women to our communities. The team also has a detailed description of how their game work and the goals into phases, which I think will impact a lot to the development of Cardano network, especially to kids and women whom I also didn't see on any other NFT games. 
With their non-combat-oriented gameplay, hope that they will have more modes for kids, and content for the development of kids - one of their key target players.
f6_assessments.q1:
They have a perfect team for developing this project, also as they mention they're already working on it for a while. That's the reason why they have a so perfect proposal for this idea: perfect context and also provide clearly info about how their idea strongly impacts the Cardano ecosystem. 
Technically, their broken-down budget is very reasonable with the detailed roadmap to hit their success. 
More than that, they also addressed their 2 risks and point out how they will kill them. So I strongly believe that the team will make this idea come true and so you do.
f6_assessments.q2:
This is one of my triple 5 rate projects because their provided information for the audibility is fulfilled. We can check their member's information not only on this proposal but also on their website, moreover, we can check the development updates on their blog articles. 
And again, their success metrics and goals are very clear and align with this challenge. Their roadmap also has a realistic arrangement to help them acquire their success.

f6_assessments.q0:
The idea of customizable NFT is absolutely can solve the problem that they have and they're within this challenge. 
The proposal also have a clear success key metric that fit with the challenge setting. Those key metric can show how their work affect to the Cardano ecosystem. Especially to kids and women, targets that they aim to be players of their game.
f6_assessments.q1:
Proposal have clear the detail of: 
- Roadmap that was detailed in to related activities that affect to the goal of that phase
- The budget allocation that they break into specific position and workload for each of their position 
- For supporting to the roadmap, they also have very clear goal in 6, 12, 24 months that show how their work will be done and they're all reasonable to their detail explaination about the game. 
The proposal also have show some key risk and how they solve it. 
Moreover, with the experience of their team we can believe that they will succeed.
f6_assessments.q2:
Proposal have: 
- Very detail roadmap that devided to field 
- Their success goals fit with the roadmap and they can get it with their reasonable break-down 
- And these goals are also fit with what they explain above, how the game work and how it solve their problem clearly. This also show us that they really aligh with the challenge setting. 
Moreover, they also have their own website and some important info for audi we can find there including: 
- Team information 
- Regularly update the development progress in blog section 
I think

f6_assessments.q0:
The game is not just for finance-driven players but I think it will strongly affect a lot of kids and their parents to join to be aware of the Cardano ecosystem that the team also mention. The idea of customizable NFT is one of the special things that I don't see in most other NFT games, but when this project successfully deploys it I think it will drive a lot of users because now they can put their personality into their assesses. 
The project also has key success targets very clear and detail in a particular period of time, most of them directly align with the challenge setting and really help to develop Cardano ecosystem well.
f6_assessments.q1:
I think team should provide some more detail about the game environment, it will help us assess your work estimation better. The only info in the proposal we saw here is just only about how we can customize the NFT and general info about the environment. 
Looking into the roadmap, we can see it is a complex project but I think with the experiences of their team members, it will succeed. 
This proposal is nearly perfect and I hope that the team can get their goals as they detailed there.
f6_assessments.q2:
With the detail of the roadmap into single fields and achievable goals, it's enough for us to audit the project. 
Moreover, the project also has a very detailed explanation about how they solve the problem that can help us well understand how their work will be and that also how their roadmap was made. 
But as I said before, wish that they will have more detail.

f6_assessments.q0: The general idea seems interesting, in creating your own special character and that it is for all age groups. That means a bigger market. It would be beneficial if the game itself would be a little bit more explained. It is mentioned as adventure based game and social based game, but more details would be helpful. The team itself looks as experienced group in gaming and in blockchain.
f6_assessments.q1: It looks as the plan could be implemented successfully. The market for the game is big enough to cover multiple age groups and the team seems to be experienced enough. The stages of the project are well explained with achievable milestones. It does depend a lot on first sales of NFTs, but it is gaining a lot of followers on Project Catalyst so that could be a good indicator of future.
f6_assessments.q2: As mentioned, the milestones are nicely explained and seem to be achievable. As Q4/2021 is ending it would be nice to see what is done in that time slot, if the project is on track as planed a lot of things are mentioned as 'ongoing'. More details would be nice to see.

f6_assessments.q0: An adorable CNFT game that looks exciting and fun for all ages. Being a community driven NFT adventure game as stated in the proposal, users will customize their own NFT before game is released, and then they will mint to their new NFT friend on the blockchain, and that NFT will be used in Flooftopia upon the game's release. This effectively promotes cardano blockchain and makes it attractive to gamers.
f6_assessments.q1: With the team's experience in coding, Art, Marketing, game design and strategic advisory, coupled with their ability to have launched the game already (currently ongoing), the proposal can be executed successfully. The detailed plan showing the different phases and the explanation of the whole game process in the proposal, implementation will be successful.
f6_assessments.q2: The time line is very comprehensible with the breakdown into different phases of success factors makes it auditable. The budget breakdown is quite detailed and auditing will be effective.

f6_assessments.q0:
Your scheme is very creative and lovely for lovers of light games. Interestingly, the author added the content of NFT codes into the game, which appeals to players including mothers and children. 
However, from the point of view of a mother of 2 children, I have the opposite opinion of the proposal, perhaps children are the objects to avoid or limit the use of mobile devices, especially content. novelties include NFT that draws them in. Children need more activity, more abstract thinking than existing in digital video games, and for their future worldview. 
I always want the proposal to focus on making engaging content for real game lovers.
f6_assessments.q1:
Regarding the feasibility of the proposal:
- Experienced team with members with necessary skills to complement each other, from programmers, marketers to game artists. The identity of the members is easy to verify and interact with on social networks.
- The solution of the project has not been clearly stated, especially the explanation of the project's game system. The ways that create the NFTs, the technical foundations and operate them.
f6_assessments.q2:
The auditability of the proposal:
- The author proposes to provide a very detailed budget description that is necessary, it is easy for investors to consider the budget.
However, with $57,000 in funding, you can break it down into phases of a project that will have a higher chance of being accepted.
- A roadmap is also very clear and a timeline with specific criteria.
- The risks of the project are also mentioned, but more radical solutions are needed.

solution: 我们将建立一个可爱的、可定制的NFT铸币和CNFT游戏，注重对所有人口群体的包容性，包括孩子们！我们的目标是让所有的人都能参与进来。
experience:
编码。Dirk
艺术。克里斯
市场营销。康沃德
游戏设计。亚历克斯
战略顾问。马金
